title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier
writer: Armand Constantine, David Neiss (Scriptwriting Support), Francis Nief (lead writer)
actors: Troy Baker, Roger R. Cross, Brian Bloom, Gideon Emery
plot: There is nothing fair, honorable, or just about combat. There is only winning and losing - the dead and the living. The Ghosts don't fret about even odds. They do everything in their power ...
